name: Six Channel Module
summary: Learn about .6CM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Fasttracker is obscure, but fans of retro game music and sound effects may still use the program and 6CM format. The format is an extension of the standard four-channel Module (.MOD) format by adding two more channels for managing additional audio elements, such as instruments or effects, to create multi-layered audio.

instructions: You can open 6CM files with Triton Fasttracker 2 in Windows.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
